nodes.text: The A-A3 Dray light speeder truck was a model of speeder truck manufactured by Trast Heavy Transports. A common sight throughout the galaxy, it was notably used in the clone trooper training area in Tipoca City, Kamino, at the time of the Clone Wars.

Smaller and lighter than the A-A5 speeder truck, the A-A3 Dray was a model of speeder truck that featured an enclosed cab that sat three abreast (counting the pilot) and a long, open bed that could carry cargo or eight passengers.

The A-A3 Dray was a common sight throughout the galaxy. During the Clone Wars, Drays were used in the clone trooper training area in Tipoca City, Kamino, to move equipment throughout the huge chamber, and were kept in storage garages fitted inside the walls.
